remarks: If two complex numbers are equal, their quotient is one.  One-way deduction form of ~ diveq1 .  Converse of ~ diveq1d .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
diveq1bd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
diveq1bd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
diveq1bd.3 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
diveq1bd $p |- ( ph -> ( A / B ) = 1 ) $.
